programs.title: React JS Fundamental
programs.description: Learn the core concepts of React including components, props, state, and hooks. Build your first React application and understand the virtual DOM.

mentor.name: Aidityas Adhakim
mentor.about: An expert programmer with 8+ years of experience in frontend development and 5 years teaching React frameworks.

programs.title: Advanced JavaScript Mastery
programs.description: Deep dive into JavaScript's advanced features including closures, promises, async/await, and functional programming patterns.

mentor.name: Farhan Dwi Setiawan
mentor.about: JavaScript specialist with experience at top tech companies and author of multiple programming books.

programs.title: Full Stack Development Bootcamp
programs.description: Comprehensive program covering both frontend and backend development using MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js).

mentor.name: Diana Putri
mentor.about: Full stack developer with 10+ years experience building scalable applications for startups and enterprises.

programs.title: UI/UX Design Principles
programs.description: Learn the fundamentals of user interface and user experience design. Create wireframes, prototypes and understand user research methods.

mentor.name: Farhan Ahmad
mentor.about: Award-winning UI/UX designer who has worked with global brands to create intuitive and beautiful digital experiences.

programs.title: Data Science Essentials
programs.description: Introduction to data analysis, visualization, and machine learning using Python, pandas, and scikit-learn.

mentor.name: Grace Tanoto
mentor.about: Data scientist with expertise in predictive modeling and data analysis with a PhD in Computer Science.

programs.title: DevOps and CI/CD Pipeline
programs.description: Master continuous integration, continuous deployment, and infrastructure as code using Docker, Kubernetes, and Jenkins.

mentor.name: Hendro Wijaya
mentor.about: DevOps engineer with extensive experience implementing CI/CD pipelines for large-scale enterprise applications.

programs.title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
programs.description: Create cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android using Google's Flutter framework and Dart programming language.

mentor.name: Indra Kusuma
mentor.about: Mobile app developer who has published over 20 apps with millions of downloads on both App Store and Google Play.

programs.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
programs.description: Learn about common security threats, encryption, secure coding practices, and how to protect applications from attacks.

mentor.name: Jessica Anggita
mentor.about: Certified ethical hacker and security consultant who has helped secure systems for banking and government institutions.

programs.title: Cloud Computing with AWS
programs.description: Learn to design, deploy and manage applications on Amazon Web Services including EC2, S3, Lambda, and DynamoDB.

mentor.name: Kevin Hartanto
mentor.about: AWS certified solutions architect with experience migrating enterprise applications to cloud infrastructure.

programs.title: Blockchain Development
programs.description: Introduction to blockchain technology and smart contract development using Ethereum and Solidity programming language.

mentor.name: Linda Suryani
mentor.about: Blockchain specialist who has worked on multiple DeFi projects and contributed to open-source blockchain protocols.
